thread.section_title: FabKids Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FabKids | fabkids.com | 4 of 120
thread.title: Kelcie

author: Kelcie
title: Kelcie
text: I joined fabkids after purchasing Fabletics. Great material, cute designs, pleanty options, affordable, on time shipments, easy. Thank you for all the special promotions! I have three kids, I am 25, I work and go to school. Shopping takes time and sometimes money I dont have. I buy clothes and shoes every month so Fabkids is great for the mom on the go! Purchases were made from my cell phone and where fast and convienent. Love it!
